Sleep

The Postmasters Boutique Hotel

Located above the ferry landing in the picturesque Rawene Village. Extensive decks look out over 3 sides of the Hokianga Harbour. Quirky ambience and warm hospitality. Breakfast menu and inhouse dining by arrangement.
Call +64 9 405 7676
http://thepostmasterslodgings.co.nz

Marriner's Boutique Guesthouses

Now you can enjoy the elegant appointments, spectacular sunsets over the Hokianga, fine wines and restaurant quality home cooked meals of MARRINER'S BOUTIQUE GUESTHOUSES all year round. Whether you are looking for a romantic getaway or traveling New Zealand on vacation, Marriner's understated style and serene environs are a welcome and well deserved change from the ordinary.
Call +64 09 405 7881
https://www.marrinersnewzealand.com/

Masonic Hotel

Currently closed for renovations
Facebook

Wharf House

Situated on the Rawene waterfront, the historic Wharf House dating back to the 1840's (Rawene's first hospital in 1909) has undergone a 10 year long restoration with new bathrooms, heat pumps, kitchen, restored original Kauri floors and more. The Wharf House is a great base to explore the many attractions in the Hokianga and Far North, or as a get away for a quiet weekend.
HomeAway

Rawene Motorcamp

If you are looking for tranquility in a peaceful rural setting but close to the many unique features of New Zealand's Hokianga Harbour, then we are the place for you! Rawene Holiday Park is situated on a hilltop, sheltered by tranquil, native bush, offering our guests the opportunity to relax and enjoy fantastic views over the Hokianga Harbour and impressive sunsets.
Bookings: Call +64 9 405 7720
http://www.raweneholidaypark.co.nz/
